Name: copyprivate
Description: copyprivate is a clause that can be used in a single construct; it acts as a mechanism to broadcast the value of a variable private to an implicit task to those of other implicit tasks in the parallel region.

Parameters.Name: list
Parameters.Description: The variables to pass as copyprivate, separated by commas.
